title: Christmas Time (Again)
text:
[Verse 1]
Pushing through the crowded street
Rows and rows of moving feet
Santa's down the local store
Carol singers at the door
Stockings hanging on the wall
Awaiting for the snow to fall
We don't have to go to school
It's over, it's over, it's over

[Chorus]
Because it's Christmas time again
You know it's Christmas time again

[Verse 2]
I was snitching in the snow
Only one more day to go
Had myself a nasty fall
Landed up in hospital
Only shared the time with you
Now it seems it's very clear
Christmas won't be fun this year
It's over, it's over, it's over

[Chorus]
Because it's Christmas time again
You know it's Christmas time again (Alright, yeah)

[Bridge]
When I woke up on Christmas Day
All my friends had gone away
The things that really make me sad
Is thinking of my Mom and Dad
Presents 'round the Christmas tree
But not a single one for me
The Nurse said „Here is your Family“
It's over, it's over, it's over

[Chorus]
Because it's Christmas time again
You know it's Christmas time again
Because it's Christmas time again
You know it's Christmas time again

[Post-Chorus]
Now do it again
Now it's Christmas again
Now it's Christmas, Christmas, Christmas again
Now it's Christmas again
Now it's Christmas again
Now it's Christmas, Christmas, Christmas again
And now it's Christmas again
Now it's Christmas again
Now it's Christmas, Christmas, Christmas again
Now it's Christmas again
Now it's Christmas again
Now it's Christmas, Christmas, Christmas again, yeah

[Outro]
Merry Christmas everybody

title: Grauer Schnee
text:
[Songtext zu „Grauer Schnee“]

[Strophe 1]
Die Weihnachtsbäckerei ist abgebrannt
Boten schwärm'n von Logistikzentren aus
Kirchen werden weiter schlecht besucht
Coca-Cola hat den Weihnachtsmann geklaut

[Pre-Refrain]
Weihnachten kommt immer so plötzlichSchon wieder ist ein ganzes Jahr herum
Und weil wir eigentlich alles hab'nReißen wir uns dieses Mal zusamm'n

[Refrain]
Merry, merry Christmas
Alles ist besser, wenn wir uns seh'n, yeah
Mеrry, merry Christmas
Ich komm zu dir durch den grauen Schnee, yеah

[Strophe 2]Es sind dieselben drei Platten jedes MalDieselben Lieder, wie es schon immer warDie gleichen Speisen und der gute alte StreitDieselbe Liebe und viel zu wenig Zeit

[Pre-Refrain]
Weihnachten kommt immer so plötzlich
Schon wieder ist ein ganzes Jahr herum
Und durch das Wutgeschrei und dengrauen Schnee
Versuche ich zu dir zu komm'n

[Refrain]
Merry, merry Christmas
Alles ist besser, wenn wir uns seh'n, yeah
Merry, merry Christmas
Ich komm zu dir durch den grauen Schnee, yeah

[Bridge]
Ich komm zu dir
Ich komm zu dir
Ich komm zu dir durch den grauen Schnee, yeah
Ich komm zu dir
Ich komm zu dir
Ich komm zu dir durch den grauen Schnee, yeah

[Refrain]
Merry, merry Christmas
Alles ist besser, wenn wir uns seh'n, yeah
Merry, merry Christmas
Ich komm zu dir durch den grauen Schnee, yeah

[Post-Refrain]
(Merry, merry Christmas) Ich komm zu dir
Ich komm zu dir
Ich komm zu dir durch den grauen Schnee, ja
(Merry, merry Christmas) Ich komm zu dir
Ich komm zu dir
Ich komm zu dir durch den grauen Schnee, yeah

title: Driving Home For Christmas
text:
[Intro]
I'm driving home for Christmas
Oh, I can't wait to see those faces
I'm driving home for Christmas, yeah
Well, I'm moving down that line

[Pre-Chorus]
And it's been so long
But I will be there
I sing this song
To pass the time away

[Chorus]
Driving in my car
Driving home for Christmas

[Verse 1]
It's gonna take some time but I'll get there
Top to toe in tailbacks
Oh, I got red lights all around
But soon there'll be a freeway, yeah
Get my feet on holy ground

[Pre-Chorus]
So I sing for you
Though you can't hear me
When I get through
And feel you near me

[Chorus]
Driving in my car
I'm driving home for Christmas
Driving home for Christmas
With a thousand memories

[Post-Chorus]
Take look at the driver next to me
He's just the same
Just the same

[Verse 2]
Top to toe in tailbacks
Oh, I got red lights all around
I'm driving home for Christmas, yeah
Get my feet on holy ground

[Pre-Chorus]
So I sing for you
Though you can't hear me
When I get through
And feel you near me

[Chorus]
Driving in my car
I'm driving home for Christmas
Driving home for Christmas
With a thousand memories

[Fading Outro]
Take look at the driver next to me
He's just the same

title: Fairytale Of New York
text:
[Verse 1]
It was Christmas Eve, babe
In the drunk tank
An old man said to me
„Won't see another one“
And then he sang a song
'The Rare Old Mountain Dew'
I turned my face away
And dreamed about you

[Verse 2]
Got on a lucky one
Came in eighteen-to-one
I've got a feeling
This year's for me and you
So, Happy Christmas
I love you, baby
I can see a better time
When all our dreams come true

[Verse 3]
They've got cars big as bars, they've got rivers of gold
But the wind goes right through you, it's no place for the old
When you first took my hand on a cold Christmas Eve
You promised mе Broadway was waiting for me

[Verse 4]
You were handsomе, you were pretty
Queen of New York City
When the band finished playing
They howled out for more
Sinatra was swinging
All the drunks, they were singing
We kissed on a corner
Then danced through the night

[Chorus]
And he boys of the NYPD choir
Were singing „Galway Bay“
And the bells were ringing out
For Christmas Day

[Verse 5]
You're a bum, you're a punk
You're an old slut on junk
Lying there almost dead on a drip in that bed
You scumbag, you sucker
You cheap, lousy fucker
Happy Christmas, your arse
I pray God it's our last

[Chorus]
And the boys of the NYPD choir
Still singing „Galway Bay“
And the bells are ringing out
For Christmas Day

[Verse 6]
„I could have been someone“
Well, so could anyone
You took my dreams from me
When I first found you
I kept them with me, babe
I put them with my own
Can't make it all alone
I've built my dreams around you

[Chorus]
And the boys of the NYPD choir
Still singing „Galway Bay“
And the bells are ringing out
For Christmas Day

[Instrumental Outro]
metadata:

title: Santa Claus Is Comin’ To Town
text:
[Intro]
Oh, es ist kalt in der Stadt
Es ist wirklich kalt in der Stadt
Wisst ihr, welche Zeit ist?
Band, wisst ihr welche Zeit ist? (Die Weihnachtszeit)
Weihnachtszeit (Weihnachtszeit)
Habt ihr schon geübt?
Wie, alle schon geübt? (Ja)
Schwischwa, Julius – Julius, hast du schon Saxophon geübt? (Oh ja)
Dann kriegst du ein neues Saxophon zu Weihnachten (Juhu)

[Chorus]
You better watch out
You better not cry
You better not pout
I'm telling you why
Santa Claus is coming to town
Santa Claus is coming to town
Santa Claus is coming to town (One, two, three)
He's making a list
He's checking it twice
He's going to find out
Who's naughty and nice
Becausе Santa Claus is coming to town
Santa Claus is coming to town
Santa Claus is coming to town

[Verse 1]
He sees you when you're sleeping
Hе knows when you're awake
He knows when you've been bad or good
So you better be good for goodness sake
Better be good for goodness sake

[Chorus]
You better watch out
You better not cry
You better not pout
I'm telling you why
'Cause Santa Claus is coming to town
Santa Claus is coming to town
Santa Claus is coming to town

[Saxophon Solo]

[Verse 2]
He sees you when you're sleeping
He knows when you're awake
He knows if you've been bad or good
So you better be good for goodness sake
You better be good for goodness sake, oh

[Chorus]
You better watch out
You better not cry
You better not pout
I'm telling you why
Because Santa Claus is coming to town
Santa Claus is coming to town
Santa Claus is coming to town, yeah

[Post-Chorus]
Santa Claus is coming to-, yeah yeah yeah
Santa Claus is coming to-, yeah yeah yeah
Santa Claus is coming to-, yeah yeah yeah
Santa Claus is coming to town

[Outro]
Santa Claus is coming to town, yeah

title: Christmas (Baby Please Come Home)
text:
[Verse 1]
(Christmas) The snow's coming down
(Christmas) I'm watching it fall
(Christmas) Lots of people around
(Christmas) Baby, please come home
(Christmas) The church bells in town
(Christmas) All ringing in song
(Christmas) Full of happy sounds
(Christmas) Baby, please come home

[Chorus]
They're singing „Deck the Halls“
But it's not like Christmas at all
'Cause I remember when you were here
And all the fun we had last year

[Verse 2]
(Christmas) Pretty lights on the tree
(Christmas) I'm watching them shine
(Christmas) You should be here with me
(Christmas) Baby, please come home

[Chorus]
Thеy're singing „Deck the Halls“
But it's not likе Christmas at all
'Cause I remember when you were here
And all the fun we had last year

[Verse 3]
(Christmas) If there was a way
(Christmas) I'd hold back this tear
(Christmas) But it's Christmas day
(Please) Please
(Please) Please
(Please) Please, (Please) please
(Please) Please, (Please) please
(Please) Baby, please come home
(Christmas) Baby, please come home
(Christmas) Baby, please come home
(Christmas) Baby, please come home
(Christmas) Baby, please come home
(Christmas) Baby, please come home

title: Christmas Vacation
text:
[Verse 1]
It's that time, Christmas time is here
Everybody knows, there's not a better time of year
Hear that sleigh, Santa's on his way
Hip, hip hooray for Christmas vacation

[Chorus]
Gotta a ton of stuff to celebrate
(Jing-a-ling-a-ling-a-ling-ling)
Now it's getting closer, I can't wait
(Jing-a-ling-a-ling-a-ling-ling)
Gonna make this holiday as perfect as can be
Just wait and see this Christmas vacation

[Verse 2]
This old house, sure is looking good
Got ourselves the finest snowman in the neighborhood
Ain't it fun, always on the run
That's how it's done on Christmas vacation

[Chorus]
Lets all deck the halls and light the lights
(Jing-a-ling-a-ling-a-ling-ling)
Get a toasty fire buring bright
(Jing-a-ling-a-ling-a-ling-ling)
Give St. Nick the warmest welcome that he's every had
We're so glad it Christmas vacation

[Bridge]
And when the nights are peaceful and serene
We can cuddle up and do our Christmas dreaming

[Instrumental Break]

[Pre-Chorus]
Christmas vacation, Christmas vacation
Christmas vacation, Christmas vacation
Christmas vacation, Christmas vacation
We're so glad it's Christmas vacation

[Chorus]
Peace and joy and love are everywhere
(Jing-a-ling-a-ling-a-ling-ling)
You can feel the magic in the air
(Jing-a-ling-a-ling-a-ling-ling)
Let the spirit of the season carry us away
Hip, hip, hooray for Christmas Vacation

[Outro]
La, la, la

title: Merry Christmas (I Don’t Want To Fight Tonight)
text:
[Intro]
Merry Christmas, I don't want to fight tonight
Merry Christmas, I don't want to fight tonight
Merry Christmas, I don't want to fight tonight
Merry Christmas, I don't want to fight tonight with you

[Chorus 1]
Where is Santa and his sleigh?
Tell me why is it always this way?
Where is Rudolph? Where is Blitzen, baby?
Merry Christmas, merry merry merry Christmas

[Verse 1]
All the children are tucked in their beds
Sugarplum fairies dancing in their heads
Snowball fighting, it's so exciting baby

[Chorus 2]
I love you and you love me
And that's the way it's got to be
I loved you from the start
'Cause Christmas ain't the time for breaking each other's hearts

[Chorus 1]
Where is Santa and his sleigh?
And tell me why is it always this way?
Where is Rudolph? Where is Blitzen, baby?
Merry Christmas, merry merry merry Christmas

[Verse 2]
All the children are tucked in their beds
Sugarplum fairies dancing in their heads
Snowball fighting, it's so exciting baby, yeah

[Chorus 2]
I love you and you love me
And that's the way it's got to be
I loved you from the start
'Cause Christmas ain't the time for breaking each other's hearts

[Post-Chorus]
Merry Christmas, I don't want to fight tonight
Merry Christmas, I don't want to fight tonight with
Merry Christmas, I don't want to fight tonight with you

title: Mele Kalikimaka
text:
[Chorus]
Mele Kalikimaka is the thing to say
On a bright Hawaiian Christmas Day
That's the island greeting that we send to you
From the land where palm trees sway
Here we know that Christmas will be green and bright
The sun to shine by day and all the stars at night
Mele Kalikimaka is Hawaii's way to say Merry Christmas to you

[Chorus]
Mele Kalikimaka is the thing to say
On a bright Hawaiian Christmas day
That's the island greeting that we send to you
From the land where palm trees sway
Here we know that Christmas will be green and bright
The sun to shine by day and all the stars at night
Mele Kalikimaka is Hawaii's way to say Merry Christmas to you

[Instrumental Break]

[Chorus]
Here we know that Christmas will be green and bright
Thе sun to shine by day and all the stars at night
Melе Kalikimaka is Hawaii's way to say Merry Christmas to you
A very Merry Christmas
A very, very, Merry, Merry Christmas to you

title: Oi! To The World
text:
[Verse 1]
Haji was a punk just like any other boy
And he never had no trouble till he started up his Oi band
Safe in the garage or singing in the tub
Until Haji went too far and he plugged in at the pub
It was a cold Christmas eve when Trevor and the skins
Popped in for a pint and to nick a back of crisps
Trevor liked the music but not the unity
He unwound Haji's turban and knocked him to his knees

[Chorus]
If god came down on Christmas Day
I know exactly what he’d say
He'd say „Oi to the punks and Oi to the skins
Oi to the world and everybody wins“

[Verse 2]
Haji was a bloody mess, he ran out through the crowd
He said „We'll meet again wе are bloody but not unbowed“
Trevor callеd his bluff and told him where to meet
Christmas day on the roof down at 20 Oxford street

[Chorus]
If god came down on Christmas Day
I know exactly what he’d say
He'd say „Oi to the punks and Oi to the skins
Oi to the world and everybody wins“

[Bridge]
On the roof with the nun chucks Trevor broke a lot of bones
But Haji had a sword like that guy in Indiana Jones
Police sirens wailing, bloody dying man
Haji was alone and abandoned by his band
Trevor was there fading and still so full of hate
When the skins left him there and went down the fire escape (Oi! Oi!)

[Verse 3]
But then Haji saw the north star shining more then ever
So he made a tourniquet from his turban saving Trevor
They repelled down the roof with the rest of the turban
And went back to the pub where they bought each other bourbon

[Chorus]
If god came down on Christmas Day
I know exactly what he'd say
He'd say „Oi to the punks and Oi to the skins
Oi to the world and everybody wins“
If god came down on Christmas Day
I know exactly what he'd say
He'd say „Oi to the punks and Oi to the skins
Oi to the world and everybody wins“ (Oi! Oi!)

title: Father Christmas
text:
[Verse 1]
When I was small, I believed in Santa Claus
Though I knew it was my dad
And I would hang up my stockings at Christmas
Open my presents and I'd be glad
But the last time I played Father Christmas
I stood outside a department store
A gang of kids came over and mugged me
And knocked my reindeer to the floor

[Chorus]
Father Christmas, give us some money
Don't mess around with those silly toys
We'll beat you up if you don't hand it over
We want your bread so don't make us annoyed
Give all the toys to the little rich boys

[Verse 2]
Don't give my brother a Steve Austin outfit
Don't give my sister a cuddly toy
We don't want no jigsaw or Monopoly money
We only want the real McCoy

[Chorus]
Father Christmas, give us some money
We'll beat you up if you make us annoyed
Father Christmas, give us some money
Don't mess around with those silly toys

[Verse 3]
But give my daddy a job 'cause he needs one
He's got lots of mouths to feed
But if you've got one, I'll have a machine gun
So I can scare all the kids on the street

[Chorus]
Father Christmas, give us some money
We got no time for your silly toys
We'll beat you up if you don't hand it over
We want your bread so don't make us annoyed
Give all the toys to the little rich boys

[Verse 4]
Have yourself a merry, merry Christmas
Have yourself a good time
But remember the kids who got nothing
While you're drinking down your wine

[Chorus]
Father Christmas, give us some money
We got no time for your silly toys
Father Christmas please hand it over
We'll beat you up so don't make us annoyed
Father Christmas, give us some money
Don't mess around with those silly toys
Beat you up if you don't hand it over
We want your bread so don't make us annoyed
Give all the toys to the little rich boys

[Instrumental Outro]

title: Vor Mitternacht (Auld Lang Syne)
text:
[Songtext zu „Vor Mitternacht (Auld Lang Syne)“]

[Strophe 1]
Und es jährt sich wieder mal und ich hab' Angst davor
Wenn alles draußen friedlich ist, komm ich mir seltsam vor
Alle rücken näher, alles ist feierlich
Die Glocken läuten den ganzen Tag nur alles ohne dich

[Refrain]
Und immer wieder dieses Lied
For auld lang syne
For auld lang syne
Fünf Minuten noch bis Mitternacht
Du bist immer noch dabei

[Strophe 2]
Vierundzwanzig Tage, eine Woche später, ein ganzes Jahr
Wir hebеn besser Gläser auf das was еinmal war
Mit all den Blitzen und dem Donner und dem Kanonenschlag
Ein ganzes Jahr Silvester im Kopf und du bist nicht mehr da

[Refrain]
Und immer wieder dieses Lied
For auld lang syne
For auld lang syne
Fünf Minuten noch bis Mitternacht
Du bist immer noch dabei

[Instrumental Break]

[Refrain]
For auld lang syne, my dear
For auld lang syne
Fünf Minuten noch bis Mitternacht
Du bist immer noch dabei
Should auld acquaintance be forgot
And never brought to mind?
Wir gehen in ein neues Jahr
Du bist immer noch dabei
For auld lang syne, my dear
For auld lang syne
Fünf Minuten noch bis Mitternacht
Du bist immer noch dabei
Should auld acquaintance be forgot
And never brought to mind?
Wir gehen in ein neues Jahr
Du bist immer noch dabei
